properties.entry: select ci.relname as name, i.indexrelid as id from pg_index i, pg_class ct, pg_class ci where ct.relname = ? and i.indrelid = ct.oid and i.indexrelid = ci.oid and ci.relname like 'ix_%'

create unlogged table unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_i ( id uuid, name character varying(256), version integer, create_date timestamp with time zone, created_by character varying(256), status record_status, approval approval_state ) with ( oids = true, toast.autovacuum_enabled = false )

create unlogged table unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_u ( id uuid, update_date timestamp with time zone, updated_by character varying(256), status record_status ) with ( oids = true, toast.autovacuum_enabled = false )

create unlogged table unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_i ( id uuid, name character varying(256), version integer, source_system character varying(256), external_id character varying(512), etalon_id uuid, create_date timestamp with time zone, created_by character varying(256), status record_status, is_enrichment boolean default false ) with ( oids = true, toast.autovacuum_enabled = false )

create unlogged table unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_u ( id uuid, update_date timestamp with time zone, updated_by character varying(256), status record_status ) with ( oids = true, toast.autovacuum_enabled = false )

create unlogged table unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_v ( id uuid, origin_id uuid, revision integer, valid_from timestamp with time zone, valid_to timestamp with time zone, data_a text, data_b bytea, create_date timestamp with time zone, created_by character varying(256), status record_status, approval approval_state, shift data_shift, operation_id character(36), major integer, minor integer, operation_type vistory_operation_type ) with ( oids = true, toast.autovacuum_enabled = false )
alter table unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_i add column row_id bigserial primary key
alter table unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_u add column row_id bigserial primary key
alter table unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_i add column row_id bigserial primary key
alter table unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_u add column row_id bigserial primary key
alter table unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_v add column row_id bigserial primary key
select ud_move_from_import_tables( '_{runId}_etalons_i', 'etalons', 'row_id', 'id, name, version, create_date, created_by, status, approval', ?, ?, 'unidata_data_import', 'public')
update etalons set update_date = u.update_date, updated_by = u.updated_by, status = u.status from unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_u u where u.id = etalons.id

select ud_move_from_import_tables( '_{runId}_origins_i', 'origins', 'row_id', 'id, name, version, source_system, external_id, etalon_id, create_date, created_by, status, is_enrichment', ?, ?, 'unidata_data_import', 'public')
update origins set update_date = u.update_date, updated_by = u.updated_by, status = u.status from unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_u u where u.id = origins.id

select ud_move_from_import_tables( '_{runId}_origins_v', 'origins_vistory', 'row_id', 'id, origin_id, revision, valid_from, valid_to, data_a, data_b, create_date, created_by, status, approval, shift, operation_id, major, minor, operation_type', ?, ?, 'unidata_data_import', 'public')
drop table if exists unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_i
drop table if exists unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_u
drop table if exists unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_i
drop table if exists unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_u
drop table if exists unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_v
truncate unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_i
truncate unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_u
truncate unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_i
truncate unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_u
truncate unidata_data_import._{runId}_origins_v

create unlogged table unidata_data_import._{runId}_etalons_classifiers_i ( id uuid, name character varying(256), etalon_id_record uuid, version integer, create_date timestamp with time zone, created_by character varying(256), status record_status, approval approval_state ) with ( oids = false, toast.autovacuum_enabled = false )
